resources.string: Your companion for discovering and checking in to amazing places
Mitsubachi connects with Foursquare to help you discover nearby venues, share your favorite spots, and keep track of your check-in history.
Mitsubachi needs access to your location to find nearby venues and provide personalized recommendations. Your location data is used only to enhance your experience.
Connect your Foursquare account to check in to venues, discover new places, and track your history.
